short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a spontaneous pet project to help disc golfers get alerted to when the Sexton Firebird launches in the store

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an extension that works on the Innova discs page and helps people get alerted as to when a specific highly desired product (Nate Sexton Firebird) is available.

Directions:
-Install extension.
-Enable extension.
-Visit https://proshop.innovadiscs.com/limited/tour-series.html (Only works on this page)
-Extension will check for Sexton Firebirds
-If found, extension will navigate you to that product page and send a system notification
-If not found, will refresh the page after 15 seconds
-Disable the extension if you want the page to stop refreshing.
